scripts.test:lambda: npm run build:lambda && sam local invoke -t aws/cloudformation/template.yaml -e test/event.json LambdaHelpMe
scripts.serverless:package: aws cloudformation package --template-file aws/cloudformation/template.yaml --output-template-file packaged.yaml --s3-bucket y-cf-midway
scripts.serverless:dev: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name y-help-me-stack-dev --parameter-overrides ENVR=dev
scripts.serverless:prod: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name y-help-me-stack-prod --parameter-overrides ENVR=prod
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run serverless:package && npm run serverless:dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run serverless:package && npm run serverless:prod
